DOC.detailed_description: For subject agree participate study , participation last 1 year . Subjects undergo routine preoperative testing , would require participate study . This test include blood sample electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Follow visit do 2 week surgery , 6 week surgery , 1 year surgery . Except 1 year visit , office visit routine would request even participate study . At visit , subject ask level pain amount type pain medication take . Data gather study outcome .
